desc: Hi,We have two songs for which we need lyrics video with stock footages. These are Arabic songs, but the English Lyrics is available in the YouTube links as below:3. ASEER AHSAN - ARABIC / ENGLISH[url removed, login to view]4. Tasna'o Almustaheel - ARABIC/ENGLISH[url removed, login to view]This needs to be done on an urgent basis. We can also provide you with the Arabic lyrics. Once the job is done, we will need the project and source file for these songs.Since these songs are being displayed to an Arab crowd there are a few things to be considered while creating the video. Those points are as below:1. No use of representation of any nationality flags.2. No use of female scenes. You can use it, but do not make it obvious, maybe for a few seconds where it is unnoticeable. The crowd is mostly from the middle eastern region and they do not appreciate such scenes.3. Use of nature, adrenaline filled scenes, abstract sceneries,4. Most importantly, motivational scenes that literally relate to the words being said in the lyrics. Scenes can be for each line or for each paragraph as you wish.We are a little tight on schedule and needs to be finished on an urgent basis. Let us know if you can get this done and the charges for the same.Regards,Uniquest Team
title: Need Lyrics video done for two songs - English & Arabic

The entire budget for the production is only $5000.- Only 4 production days. From Thursday, Nov. 30th to Sunday, Dec. 3rd.- The entire Production Design budget is only $800.
